headline: Why Autodesk (ADSK) Is Up 8.4% After Raising Its Revenue and Earnings Outlook for 2025
summary: On August 28, 2025, Autodesk reported second-quarter results with revenue of US$1.76 billion and net income of US$313 million, alongside updated guidance forecasting third-quarter revenue of US$1.80 billion to US$1.81 billion and GAAP EPS of US$1.34 to US$1.42, with full-year revenue expected to reach up to US$7.08 billion. The company highlighted ongoing momentum in its Architecture, Engineering, Construction and Operations segment, underpinned by strong adoption of its Construction Cloud...
